@title Lotto lottery contract with 4 numbers
 @notice 4 numbers must match in order
The index value of the @dev number combination is fixed at 11, because 4 numbers have 11 winning combinations
@dev allocates the first/second/third reward
@dev Lotto NFT address
@dev administrator address
@dev maximum number
@dev The lowest price, if the decimal point is not 18, please reset
@notice GoSwap routing address
@notice Token for buying lottery tickets
@dev issue ID => winning numbers [numbers]
@dev release ID => [tokenId]
@dev Issue ID => [total amount, first prize bonus, second prize bonus, third prize bonus]
@dev issuance ID => lottery ticket number => total sales, total purchase amount of users
@dev address => [tokenId]
@dev release index
Total number of @dev addresses
@dev Total prize pool amount
@dev last timestamp
@dev winning number
@dev lottery stage
@dev empty ticket
@dev can only be accessed by the administrator
@dev After the draw
@dev reset
@dev enters the lottery stage, you must enter the lottery stage before the lottery is drawn

 @param _input input value
@dev checker, is it available for purchase

@dev receive rewards

@dev Collect in batches

@dev calculates the number index

@dev calculates the number of matches

@dev returns the total number of historical prize pools

@dev sets the maximum number
 @param _maxNumber maximum number

adminWithdraw(uint256).details: does not care about rewards when exiting. Emergency only

enterDrawingPhase().details: enters the lottery stage, you must enter the lottery stage before the lottery is drawn

getLotteryInfo(uint256).details: obtains the NFT Token ID according to the issue id

params._matchingNumber: matches several numbers, range [2,3,4], if the value is 5, the return is the total prize pool amount

getTotalRewards(uint256).details: returns the total number of historical prize pools

getUserInfo(address).details: Get all NFTs of the user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAdmin(address).details: Update the administrator address through the previous developer

setAllocation(uint8,uint8,uint8).details: set the prize pool distribution ratio

setMinPrice(uint256).details: sets the lowest price for a ticket

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

historyAmount.details: Issue ID => [total amount, first prize bonus, second prize bonus, third prize bonus]

keyLengthForEachBuy.details: number combination is fixed at 11, because 4 numbers have 11 winning combinations

minPrice.details: The lowest price, if the decimal point is not 18, please reset

userBuyAmountSum.details: issuance ID => lottery ticket number => total sales, total purchase amount of users

drawing(uint256).notice: adds an external random number to prevent the node verification program from using it

getRewardView(uint256).notice: bonus calculation formula: purchase price / prize pool quantity * prize pool bonus
